answers.author: Pamela Muse
answers.text:
Angel – below are links to various cities’ Assistant City Engineer job descriptions.  I hope this is helpful:
City of Escondido, CA  
http://www.escondido.org/assistant-city-engineer.aspx 
City of Columbia, IL   
http://www.columbiaillinois.com/documents/Administration/PW%20-%20Assist%20City%20Eng%20JD%20DRAFT%205-3-06.pdf 
City of Bullhead City, AZ     
http://www.bullheadcity.com/vertical/Sites/%7B1990D1CC-9371-444D-89E1-C42F66407C45%7D/uploads/%7BC89F170E-822F-44CB-B2E9-328D46B9DD35%7D.PDF 
City of Lake Havasu, AZ  
http://www.lhcaz.gov/humanResources/classSpecifications/assistantCityEngineer.pdf 
Ctiy of Ceres, CA   
http://www.ci.ceres.ca.us/jobdescriptions/AssistantCityEngineer.pdf 
City of Hailey  
http://www.haileycityhall.org/employment/pdf/Asst_Engineer_Desc.pdf 
City of Moscow, ID  
http://www.simplyhired.com/job-id/acjn6w3lfk/assistant-city-jobs/ 
Pamela Muse
Western Regional Director
Alliance for Innovation
888-468-6450
pmuse@transformgov.org

author: Angel Smith
text:
Hello! 
I am looking for job descriptions for an Assistant City Engineer position; does anyone have one available to share? 
Thanks!
title: Job description for an Assistant City Engineer
